actions: Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Hearings held.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Ordered to be reported favorably.
Reported by Senator Menendez, Committee on Foreign Relations, without printed report.
Placed on Senate Executive Calendar. Calendar No. 1. Subject to nominee's commitment to respond to requests to appear and testify before any duly constituted committee of the Senate.
By unanimous consent agreement, debate and vote today.
Confirmed by the Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 94
name: John Forbes Kerry
nominee: John Forbes Kerry, of Massachusetts, to be Secretary of State
